tests package

trainers package¶

Submodules¶

trainers.basic module¶

trainers.basic.train_the_model(model, dataloaders, device, criterion, optimizer)¶

The main trainer function that is responsible for training the model for 50 epochs. In this simple example I have not considered a large degree of freedom (for example one should normally be able to adjust the maximum number of epochs, optimization parameters, etc.). In larger examples, these must be noted as well.

Module contents¶
